movies.title: The Big Switch
movies.plot: Playboy John Carter is implicated in the murder of a blonde from a discotheque and is forced by gangsters into posing for pornographic photographs.
movies.simplePlot: Playboy John Carter is implicated in the murder of a blonde from a discotheque and is forced by gangsters into posing for pornographic photographs.

biography.bio: Sebastian Breaks was born on February 11, 1936 in Marylebone, London, England as Sebastian Granville Gough Breaks. He is an actor, known for The Heroes of Telemark (1965), The Big Switch (1968) and Laughter in the Dark (1969).
biography.name: Sebastian Breaks

biography.bio: Virginia Wetherell was born on May 9, 1943 in Farnham, Surrey, England. She is an actress, known for A Clockwork Orange (1971), Dracula (1974) and The Crimson Cult (1968). She was previously married to Ralph Bates.
biography.name: Virginia Wetherell

biography.bio: Jack Allen was born on October 23, 1907 in Sandbach, Cheshire, England. He was an actor, known for The Four Feathers (1939), Breaking the Sound Barrier (1952) and The Headless Ghost (1959). He died on May 25, 1995 in London, England.
biography.name: Jack Allen

biography.bio: Derek Aylward was born on October 29, 1922 in Maidenhead, England as Derek Anthony Aylward. He was an actor, known for School for Sex (1969), Man of Violence (1971) and The Dirtiest Girl I Ever Met (1970). He died on July 10, 2005 in Sussex, England.
biography.name: Derek Aylward

biography.bio: Erika Raffael is an actress, known for Tango 2001 (1974), The Big Switch (1968) and Man of Violence (1971).
biography.name: Erika Raffael

biography.bio: Douglas Blackwell was born on May 17, 1924 in Gloucester, England. He was an actor, known for Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991), Labyrinth (1986) and 10 Rillington Place (1971). He died on October 17, 2009 in Victoria, London, England.
biography.name: Douglas Blackwell

biography.bio: Julie Shaw is an actress, known for Nightbirds (1970), The Big Switch (1968) and Arabesque (1966).
biography.name: Julie Shaw

biography.bio: Jane Howard is an actress, known for The Big Switch (1968).
biography.name: Jane Howard

biography.bio: Roy Sone was born in 1940 in the UK. He is an actor, known for The Big Switch (1968), The Man Outside (1967) and The Explorer (1955).
biography.name: Roy Sone

biography.bio: Nicholas Hawtrey is an actor, known for Dangerous Liaisons (1988), French Kiss (1995) and Brève traversée (2001).
biography.name: Nicholas Hawtrey

biography.bio: Brian Weske was born on December 23, 1932 in Stockwell, London, England. He is known for his work on Fortune Lane (1947), Hell, Heaven or Hoboken (1958) and Vacation from Marriage (1945). He was married to Yole Marinelli. He died on October 15, 2001 in London.
biography.name: Brian Weske

biography.bio: Gilly Grant is an actress, known for The Bullet Machine (1970), School for Sex (1969) and The Big Switch (1968).
biography.name: Gilly Grant

biography.bio: Desmond Cullum-Jones was born on December 1, 1924 in Seattle, Washington, USA. He was an actor and producer, known for Freak Out (2004), Dad's Army (1971) and Wednesday's Child (1962). He was married to Elizabeth. He died on June 6, 2002 in Poole, Dorset, England.
biography.name: Desmond Cullum-Jones

filmingLocations.location: West Pier, Brighton, East Sussex, England, UK
